title: Ep 187 | Why Phil's Duck and Dressing Is So Good and the Man Who Says He Took 'Duck Dynasty' Down
description:
Jase tumbles into the pool with his dog while chasing a wild opossum and has a bizarre run-in with the clerk at a convenience store counter. Phil suspects you never quite get over being marked by California. Jase shares the graphic reason he stays out of New Orleans. Phil reveals the secret to what makes his duck and dressing so good. And Phil, Jase, and Al talk about the journalist who brags about taking "Duck Dynasty" down, but is that really what happened?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
